data.why:
This would be a "role account", we (the RIPE NCC Software Group) is
    planning to use it for publishing the code we're sharing with the
    community.

    Firstly, we are planning to release Net::Whois::RIPE::RPSL, a Perl
    glue for the RPSL C library:

    ftp://ftp/ripe/dbase/software/RPSL-OL-3.1.1.tar.gz
